name: MC DCT Tutorial
description:
This tutorial is designed to teach you how to use the MC DCT conversation simulator. MC DCT is a text-based game that helps you practice using English in an academic setting, such as on a university campus. There are currently 5 scenarios for you to play through, though more may be coming soon.

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

  • Webcam & microphone
  • Flash must be enabled
  • Pop-ups must be allowed for this page
